    variables

    web-font-path

    $web-font-path: "https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato|Oswald:400,700";

    Description

    Baseline for all margins and gaps on the site

    Type

    String

    font-family-base

    $font-family-base: 'Lato', sans-serif;

    Description

    General theme font

    Type

    String

    headings-font-family

    $headings-font-family: 'Oswald', sans-serif;

    Description

    Title font

    Type

    String

    headings-color

    $headings-color: #dd5a6f;

    Description

    Title color

    Type

    Color

    jumbotron-heading-color

    $jumbotron-heading-color: #dd5a6f;

    Description

    Jumbotron title color

    Type

    Color

    Project

    mixins

    keyframes

    @mixin keyframes($name) { ... }

    Description

    Create a keyframe-based animation

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $name

    Identifier chosen by the developer

    		String—none

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive). Role: Rule sets go here

    Example

    @include keyframes(slide-down) {
  0% { opacity: 1; }
  90% { opacity: 0; }
}
.element {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  background: black;
  @include animation('slide-down 5s 3');
}

    animation

    @mixin animation($str) { ... }

    Description

    Prefixes name of the animation in parameter

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $str

    Name of the animation

    		String—none

    Example

    .element {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  background: black;
  @include animation('slide-down 5s 3');
}

    opacity

    @mixin opacity($opacity) { ... }

    Description

    Cross browser opacity

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $opacity

    Value between 0 and 1

    		Num—none

    Example

    .faded-text {
  @include opacity(0.8);
}
